snippet: Bob Filner was supposed to be back on the job after two weeks in rehab and a week of personal leave, but at City Hall he was nowhere to be found.
abstract: San Diego Mayor Bob Filner fails to show up on his supposed first day back after two weeks at a rehabilitation program and one week personal leave; sixteen women have stepped forward to accuse Filner of sexual harassment and inappropriate behavior, and calls for his resignation continue to mount.

byline.original: By ROB DAVIS and JENNIFER MEDINA
byline.contributor: Rob Davis reported from San Diego, and Jennifer Medina from Los Angeles.

lead_paragraph: Bob Filner was supposed to be back on the job after two weeks in rehab and a week of personal leave, but at City Hall he was nowhere to be found.

headline.main: Scandal-Weary San Diego Asks a Question: Where’s the Mayor?
headline.print_headline: Scandal-Weary San Diego Asks A Question: Where’s the Mayor?
